text: Basketball at the 2001 Games of the Small States of Europe was held from 29 May to 2 June 2001. Games were played in San Marino. In this edition, there was not women's tournament. ==Medal summary== {| |- |Men | | | |} ==Men's tournament== Men's tournament was played by seven teams divided into two groups where the two first qualified teams would join the semifinals. ===Preliminary round=== ====Group A==== ====Group B==== ===Final round=== ===Fifth position game=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- |width=150|||align=center|72 |- |'||align=center|'81 |} ==External links== *San Marino 2001 at the Luxembourg Basketball Federation website Small Category:2001 Games of the Small States of Europe 2001 Category:International basketball competitions hosted by San Marino
title: Basketball at the 2001 Games of the Small States of Europe
